Module CamelotJava
Package com.entities

Class Character

java.lang.Object
com.entities.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICreate<BodyTypes>, IInteract
public abstract class Character extends Object implements IInteract, ICreate<BodyTypes>
This abstract class represents a character. A character is an interactable (IInteract) and creatable (ICreate). Instantiating an object of type Character does NOT create the character in Camelot. To do that, you must use CreateCharacterSequence.
Author:
Alireza Shirvani
